husk.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the dry outer part of corn, some grains, seeds, nuts etc
husk.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the useless outer part of something that remains after the important or useful part is gone or has been used
husk.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: His drug addiction had turned him into a husk of his former self.
husk.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to remove the husks from grains, seeds etc
